title: Time Conquers All
description: Time-travel romance based in the late 1500's in the India region of the world. Epic romance with a warrior princess meeting the love of her life. Unfortunately, he's an American soldier from the 1960's and the king from a neighboring country. This is book one in the "time series." THIS VENDOR IS THE PUBLISHER AND THESE BOOKS WILL BE AUTOGRAPHED DIRECTLY BY THE AUTHOR.
author: P.J. Hultstrand
